_description: A song of the Passion, in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook — four six-line stanzas (aabccb) and burden: ‘Lu[u]eli ter of loueli eyȝe / Qui dostu me so wo / Sorful ter of sorful eyȝe / Þu brekst myn herte ato’

NLS18721.First Lines: þu sikest soreþi sorwe is more…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þe deuel is schentCrist þoru þe mith of
                    þe
